issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hello, I'm trying to distribute app width sdk 8.2.0 and Xcode 11 but during building it get error. 

{code:java}

[INFO]  Creating launch image set
[INFO]  Creating assets image set
[INFO]  Writing bootstrap json
[INFO]  Encrypting JavaScript files

    at _resolveUserOrg (/Users/piccilore/.appcelerator/install/7.1.1/package/node_modules/appc-cli-titanium/node_modules/appc-platform-sdk/lib/auth.js:440:11)
    at /Users/piccilore/.appcelerator/install/7.1.1/package/node_modules/appc-cli-titanium/node_modules/appc-platform-sdk/lib/auth.js:296:4
---------------------------------------------

fields.summary: xcode 11 sdk 8.2.0 impossible to build to distribuite

comments.body: [~otto.pic] I think you might be hitting an issue where the titanium_prep binary has lost the executable permissions, can you try running {{chmod +x ~/Library/Application\ Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/8.2.0.GA/iphone/titanium_prep}} to restore it and try to rebuild

You are right. Now works fine. You can close this issue.

Thanks.
I had the same issue when compiling on both ios and android. Just curious about the cause of it so that we could avoid in the future.
[~kenjorai], we think this was down to the SDK installation process of the Atom and VS Code packages. We released updates for those to fix the issue, 1.9.1 for Atom, 0.6.0 for VS Code
chmod +x ~/Library/Application\ Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/8.2.0.GA/iphone/titanium_prep   resolved this problem for me
